about_the_game:
Hunt is the only VR game that can drive and hunt at the same time! Hunt 2.0 added one more Volcanic Island to double the play content and grabbable gun and bow support.

After dinosaurs were revived, they occupied a remote island and enslaved many other animals. In order to control the dinosaurs, human beings need to research their eggs. To aid their cause, you will go to dinosaur island and collect these eggs. This is an extremely dangerous quest, and you will face attacks from terrifying dinosaurs and colony animals.

This game has twenty four thrilling levels.


Key Features:

- Use Meta Quest Touch controllers or other brand controllers to control the racer and four different cars through the river and island.

- Fight with all kinds of ferocious dinosaurs (including T-Rex, Stegosaurus, Velociraptor, Triceratops, Brachiosaurus, Ankylosaurus, Dimetrodon, Spinosaurus, Dilophosaurus , Parasaurolophus, Oviraptor, Carnotaurus, Troodon, Gallimimus, Baryonyx, Kentrosaurus, Pachycephalosaurus, Styracosaurus, Ouranosaurus, Pteranodon) and colony animals (including Onchopristis, Archelon, Sarcosuchus, Elephant, Tiger, Bear, Panda) face to face in a full-featured vehicle. Use eco-friendly air cannon to defend yourself and powerful air swirl device to collect eggs.

- Support grabble weapon: Bow and Shotgun. Flexible switch between First Person Perspective and Third Person Perspective: Grabbing the Bow or Gun will switch to First Person Perspective and releasing the Bow or Gun will switch back to Third Person Perspective. Every level has default number of arrows or gun shells to use, extra arrows will be rewarded for every three eggs collected.

- Drive through bumpy hills and jungles hunting for dinosaur eggs. Dinosaur attacks may occur at any time.

- Optimized smooth viewing angles to help you avoid the dizziness of traditional VR car games.

- The primary button on the left hand controller can give you menu help at any time.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is a survival VR adventure. There is fantasy violence, but the violence from dinosaurs or other animals is towards boat/racer and cars. Player as a driver is safe and there is no blood, sex, drug, alcohol in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Touch Controller and Valve Index Controller

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
